description: Returns the full details of an AppInstance.

nested_items.name: AppInstance
nested_items.description: The ARN, metadata, created and last-updated timestamps, and the name of the AppInstance. All timestamps use epoch milliseconds.

nested_items.name: AppInstanceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the messaging instance.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time at which an AppInstance was created. In epoch milliseconds.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time an AppInstance was last updated. In epoch milliseconds.
